title: It's A New Season of God's Favor  | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: It's A New Season of God's Favor  | Joel Osteen
description:
God has new blessings prepared for you, but in order to receive them, you have to expect His favor. Start declaring His favor over your life and expect new doors to open. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
